name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Flowers & Organisms
summary: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included. -Frog on hydrangea -White-eye and plum blossoms -Yellow swallowtail butterfly and cosmos -Ladybug on a daisy flower -Mantis on a rose -Dragonfly an…
